name: Benjamin D. Construction Co.
tag_list: home-builder, spec-home-builder, commercial-tenant-improvement, remodeling, addition, kitchen, bathroom, deck, fence, tile, roofs, windows, interior-designers, cabinet-builder, painting, foundation, patio, landscape, retaining-wall, contractor-
overview:
Benjamin D. Construction Co provides a wide range of residential construction services for clients throughout the East Bay and San Francisco, handling everything from kitchen and bathroom remodels to additions and custom home building. In addition to its new construction/remodeling capabilities, the company can replace windows, build decks and fences, install hardwood floors, and more.

Owner-operator Benjamin Dumitrascuta is a second-generation building professional—his father, Gelu, established his own construction company in the 1980s after emigrating from Eastern Europe and taught his son the trade at a very young age. “He instilled in me the importance of quality craftsmanship, and that remains my number one objective today,” says Mr. Dumitrascuta. “No matter what type of job, I’m fully committed to performing first-rate work.”

Benjamin D. Construction takes a personalized approach to dealing with customers and develops close relationships with them that continue even after their construction projects are finished. “Personal service is an important part of my process,” confirms Mr. Dumitrascuta. “It can be as simple as calling a customer to see how my work is holding up or as involved as helping them pick tile for their house. Either way, I strive to use my construction expertise to help my clients in any way I can.” COMPANY PHILOSOPHY

“I approach every job with the same set of values: accountability, reliability, superior craftsmanship and a dedication to quality. Regardless of the size of the remodeling project, I provide the same high level of service and always aim to exceed the customer’s expectations.”
